plot: A rural cobbler finally earns enough money to travel to Beijing, and what he discovers there is a world completely unlike his own.
title: A Journey to the West
plot_es: A rural cobbler finally earns enough money to travel to Beijing, and what he discovers there is a world completely unlike his own.
plot_en: A rural cobbler finally earns enough money to travel to Beijing, and what he discovers there is a world completely unlike his own.
